title: New Client not unlocking Runes/Masteries

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
TLDR
Leveled up to level 27, got confirmation screen after the game ended.
I go to Runes/Masteries and it has the little yellow dot above them to indicate something  new is unlocked.
Rune page shows levels that are meant to be unlocked still locked.
Masteries page doesnt allow for extra points to be added.

Great Client, cant wait until im dead for Item Sets.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
